DOC.brief_summary: This community-based trial study misoprostol prevention postpartum hemorrhage rural Pakistan . Traditional birth attendant assist home delivery administer study tablet ( 600 mcg oral misoprostol placebo ) third stage labor woman participate trial . Blood loss , hemoglobin level , side effect , variable evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Misoprostol Prevention Postpartum Hemorrhage Rural Pakistan
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman general good health , home delivery Must live one 78 study village Hypertension Noncephalic presentation Polyhydramnios Previous cesarean section Suspected multiple pregnancy Suspected still birth Antepartum hemorrhage Previous complication 3rd trimester Anemia < 8 g/dl
